message: I'm feeling generous, but time is money Alice. Let's wrap this up.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I still want the bigger share!
Alice, the clock is ticking, and my share is shrinking. This is my final offer.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm being generous by still offering you 30%!
Alice, this is ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome now. Take it or leave it.
You should have taken my previous offers, Bob. Now I'm taking an even bigger share!
